layout.format: This dashboard is composed of multiple pages, which contain widgets.
Widgets can contain other widgets. It is possible to create arbitrarily complex layouts by nesting.
To add/remove/rename pages, select the "sidebar" tab at the bottom and adjust the configuration.
To edit the contents of a page, click on widgets and edit/add/delete them as required. To adjust the settings of a widget, select it and edit properties it in the right panel.

To add dynamic variables which are sent to and retrieved from your application, select the 'API' tab at the bottom and modify the JSON defining the REST endpoints. Each top level object in the JSON is a new endpoint. An endpoint can contain multiple variables, and is mapped to a C structure.
To edit the configuration manually, click on the "export" button to download wizard.json configuration file. Edit it, and import back.
Click on the "Docs" toolbar button to view the JSON format details.
